channel.title: MY SERVER KEEP GLITCHING AND IT SAYS PLAYER IS ONLINE HELP PLEASE!StillNeedHelp
channel.description:
Ok so after a while of my server running it will just randomly glitch and freeze up the runserver window. This is what it reads: [code]Client type: high memory version UserId: 33816423 mr money man is signing onto server. [client-96-mr money man]: mr money man is already online. Connection accepted from CPE00132093c86e-CM0014f863269e.cpe.net.cable.rogers.com : 2595. Client type: high memory version UserId: 33816423 mr money man is signing onto server. [client-97-mr money man]: mr money man is already online. Connection accepted from CPE00132093c86e-CM0014f863269e.cpe.net.cable.rogers.com : 2596. [client-139-tyler john]: tyler john is already online. Client rejected from 58.104.184.176 Connection accepted from 24.31.240.238: 18373. Client type: low memory version UserId: 99269207 blacknight3 is signing onto server. Connection accepted from ip68-231-83-254.ph.ph.cox.net: 4285. Client rejected from 71.97.197.199 LOADED: 3 Client type: high memory version UserId: 48955192 green bay is signing onto server. [client-141-green bay]: green bay is already online. Connection accepted from bas5-london14-1088884444.dsl.bell.ca: 51425. Client rejected from 71.178.28.157 Client rejected from 71.97.197.199 Client type: high memory version UserId: 98039736 tyler john is signing onto server. [client-142-tyler john]: tyler john is already online. Client rejected from 24.174.182.146 Connection accepted from 72-19-172-11.static.mesanetworks.net: 4249. Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at client.<init>(client.java:10509) at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:48) at server.run(server.java:183) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
The parts where you see that say "client rejected (then the ip)" that is to block nulls which is from this tut right here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,322520.0.html Before I even added that tut to my server though I would ALWAYS get this problem. I AM NOT switching sources because I have done soooo much stuff on this source. Can somebody PLEASE help me and tell me what the problem is because I honestly have no clue. It's really annoying too because in that tut its made so if you log on with 4 accounts from the same IP it will automatically IP-ban you. I like it like that though and I don't want to remove that but how do I fix this "already online" glitch?

item.title: MY SERVER KEEP GLITCHING AND IT SAYS PLAYER IS ONLINE HELP PLEASE!StillNeedHelp
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Well what the heck lol… I can just turn it on and it runs fine for a few hours then it dies again. Sometimes it goes for hours… Other times it lasts for 20 minutes. What do I do? There’s got to be some code I could add.

EDIT: Was season-scape right by saying “Go to the 10509th line”?

Read full topic

item.title: MY SERVER KEEP GLITCHING AND IT SAYS PLAYER IS ONLINE HELP PLEASE!StillNeedHelp
item.dc:creator: @season_scape season_scape
item.description:
@season_scape wrote:

[quote=“runefreak10, post:7, topic:249297”][quote author=season_scape link=topic=328593.msg2570318#msg2570318 date=1228618244]

[quote]Exception in thread “Thread-0” java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
at client.(client.java:10509)
at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:48)
at server.run(server.java:183)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/quote]

in client do ctrl+g type 10509 cnp what is there and 10 lines below and above
[/quote]

I get what you’re saying but when I click edit the I go down to “Goto” it’s dimmed and it won’t let me click on it. Ctrl+G isn’t working either.[/quote]

what did u recently add to your source ?

Read full topic
item.source: MY SERVER KEEP GLITCHING AND IT SAYS PLAYER IS ONLINE HELP PLEASE!StillNeedHelp

item.title: MY SERVER KEEP GLITCHING AND IT SAYS PLAYER IS ONLINE HELP PLEASE!StillNeedHelp
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

[quote=“season_scape, post:6, topic:249297”][quote]Exception in thread “Thread-0” java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
at client.(client.java:10509)
at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:48)
at server.run(server.java:183)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/quote]

in client do ctrl+g type 10509 cnp what is there and 10 lines below and above[/quote]

I get what you’re saying but when I click edit the I go down to “Goto” it’s dimmed and it won’t let me click on it. Ctrl+G isn’t working either.

EDIT: Here is the thing with playerhandler.java though: [code] // a new client connected
public void newPlayerClient(java.net.Socket s, String connectedFrom) {
// first, search for a free slot
// int slot = -1, i = playerSlotSearchStart;
int slot = -1, i = 1;

    do {
        if (players[i] == null) {
            slot = i;
            break;
        }
        i++;
        if (i >= maxPlayers) {
            i = 0;
        }		// wrap around
        // } while(i != playerSlotSearchStart);
    } while (i <= maxPlayers);

    client newClient = new client(s, slot);

    newClient.handler = this;
    (new Thread(newClient)).start();
    if (slot == -1) {
        return;[/code]

Where it says: if (players[i] == null) { That is the 48th line.

Read full topic

The parts where you see that say “client rejected (then the ip)” that is to block nulls which is from this tut right here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,322520.0.html Before I even added that tut to my server though I would ALWAYS get this problem. I AM NOT switching sources because I have done soooo much stuff on this source. Can somebody PLEASE help me and tell me what the problem is because I honestly have no clue. It’s really annoying too because in that tut its made so if you log on with 4 accounts from the same IP it will automatically IP-ban you. I like it like that though and I don’t want to remove that but how do I fix this “already online” glitch?

Read full topic
item.source: MY SERVER KEEP GLITCHING AND IT SAYS PLAYER IS ONLINE HELP PLEASE!StillNeedHelp
